outputs.output_descr: The project will support community-led, sustainable, area-based development in four selected communities with 5,000 beneficiaries to fast-track MDG achievement at the local level. Through a small-grants scheme to community-based organizations, the project will support the communities' efforts to adopt a multi-sectoral approach to address challenges in health, education, essential infrastructure and income generation activities, with women as core beneficiaries, in each village, and will enhance the capacity of government to deliver services at the village level.

project_descr: The project will support community-led, sustainable, area-based development in four selected communities with 5,000 beneficiaries to fast-track MDG achievement at the local level.
